name: Digging For Family
description:
Your mole family was taken from you by an evil Oak Tree! He promises to return them to you if you plant his seeds, as he bestows upon you a tail made of his roots. Use your moley abilities to navigate between the dirt floor and the underground. You can walk freely underground, but your only form of navigation above ground is to launch yourself with your newfound root-tail! 

Get the seed to the seed hole in each level to continue, and hopefully save your family! 

WASD - move (when  underground) 

Space Bar - Move between ground layers at the designated holes 

Click & Drag - Slingshot yourself (when above ground)
